<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Apply any target-specific value adjustments.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift the value into position.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &lt;&lt;= Info.TargetOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/ppctlsdynamiccall-cpp/#a4a235aedca5bbfc39934045b6cbf9c70">Fixup</a>.getOffset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumBytes = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(Info.TargetSize + Info.TargetOffset, 8) / 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + NumBytes &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>.size() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid fixup offset!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each byte of the fragment that the fixup touches, mask in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bits from the fixup value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i != NumBytes; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa20539e89704d20b98b97e9c3feac934">Data</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + i&#93; |= uint8&#95;t((<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &gt;&gt; (i &#42; 8)) &amp; 0xff);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Linker relaxation may change code size. We have to insert Nops</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for .align directive when linker relaxation enabled. So then Linker</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// could satisfy alignment by removing Nops.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The function return the total Nops Size we need to insert.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvasmbackend/#a6df2a46541fffb2b35320ae71b7fe26c"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvasmbackend/#a6df2a46541fffb2b35320ae71b7fe26c">RISCVAsmBackend::shouldInsertExtraNopBytesForCodeAlign</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcalignfragment">MCAlignFragment</a> &amp;AF, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate Nops Size only when linker relaxation enabled.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &#42;STI = AF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcalignfragment/#ab891d26919538bc5b770905a54e2d495">getSubtargetInfo</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!STI-&gt;hasFeature(RISCV::FeatureRelax))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseCompressedNop = STI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo/#a0ad14e9a81239b54fd64089b3290bfde">hasFeature</a>(RISCV::FeatureStdExtC) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><Highlight kind="normal">                          STI-&gt;hasFeature(RISCV::FeatureStdExtZca);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MinNopLen = UseCompressedNop ? 2 : 4;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcalignfragment/#a5169ecb5ee59e190bdbf4d08f2e4fc8f">getAlignment</a>() &lt;= MinNopLen) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = AF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcalignfragment/#a5169ecb5ee59e190bdbf4d08f2e4fc8f">getAlignment</a>().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>() - MinNopLen;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to insert R&#95;RISCV&#95;ALIGN relocation type to indicate the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The function insert fixup&#95;riscv&#95;align fixup which eventually will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// transfer to R&#95;RISCV&#95;ALIGN relocation type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvasmbackend/#a9f78db3a67945349cd7bcee045f65b1b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvasmbackend/#a9f78db3a67945349cd7bcee045f65b1b">RISCVAsmBackend::shouldInsertFixupForCodeAlign</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp;Asm,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert the fixup only when linker relaxation enabled.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
